briefdescription.para: Test basic mutual exclusion using interrupt masking.

listitem.para: Spinlocks can be initialized at run-time.
Spinlocks in uniprocessor context should achieve mutual exclusion using interrupt masking.

detaileddescription.para: Validate using spinlock recursive will trigger assertion.
Validate unlocking incorrect spinlock will trigger assertion.
Validate unlocking incorrect spinlock will trigger assertion.
